attributes.action: To have weapon awareness lessons added on to the school curriculum
attributes.additional_details:
To have weapon awareness lessons take part in schools.

To raise awareness on how deadly weapons can be and the devastation it can cause to family’s and friend’s.

Until we raise full awareness whilst we can; weapon crime especially knife crime figures will keep increasing as this is not shown as an issue when it needs to be.

We are setting up a group http://www.onlycowardscarry.co.uk and will be setting up in a shop over the half-term in Colchester, Essex
